Darkfate/Dragonfly::

Darkfate recived Bloodstrike's signature and sent it to all his 
troops tha were outside the base together a secret menssage.

Dragonfly recived the signature and the menssage, he saw Bloodstrike 
an opened his comm link in Bloodstrike's frecuency.

"Dragonfly to visitor" said the male "I'll lead you towards 
Blackfortress... Follow me"

The male flew towards the Volcano

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Zardus::
> 
> "Good," Zardus replies, "I'm sending the bot's energy signature 
now."
> 
> He sends Bloodystrike's energy signature and terminates the 
> transmission.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Bloodystrike flies close to the volcano that the Black Fortress was 
> in, looking around.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> > Darkfate/Darkfate's troops::
> > 
> > After a large while Darkfate answered to  Zardus in a secret 
> frecuency "Count with my help agaisnt Hell Beast, " and he 
> added "What's the signature of you bot and where's Hell Beast base?"
> > 
> > Darkfate sent the menssage
> > 
> > Darkfate opened a channel "To all my troops" said the Dragon "Go 
to 
> Zone 5, we will go to fight and I have to organize you"
